HediffDef.label: Stim-Omone
HediffDef.description: This animal is being affected by pheromones, slightly enhancing their speed and consciousness.
HediffDef.descriptionShort: This animal is being affected by pheromones, slightly enhancing their speed and consciousness.

HediffDef.label: Guard-Omone
HediffDef.description: This animal is being affected by pheromones, slightly enhancing their ability to endure damage.
HediffDef.descriptionShort: This animal is being affected by pheromones, slightly enhancing their ability to endure damage.

HediffDef.label: Immun-Omone
HediffDef.description: This animal is being affected by pheromones, slightly enhancing their immunity gain against several conditions.
HediffDef.descriptionShort: This animal is being affected by pheromones, slightly enhancing their immunity gain against several conditions.

HediffDef.label: Fury-Omone
HediffDef.description: This animal is being affected by pheromones, enhancing their speed and attack speed for a while.
HediffDef.descriptionShort: This animal is being affected by pheromones, enhancing their speed and attack speed for a while.

HediffDef.label: Pain-Omone
HediffDef.description: This animal is being affected by pheromones, effectively shutting down their pain receptors and causing their skin to harden slightly for a while.
HediffDef.descriptionShort: This animal is being affected by pheromones, effectively shutting down their pain receptors and causing their skin to harden slightly for a while.

HediffDef.label: Heal-Omone
HediffDef.description: This animal is being affected by pheromones, massively enhancing their healing factor for a short time.
HediffDef.descriptionShort: This animal is being affected by pheromones, massively enhancing their healing factor for a short time.

HediffDef.label: Pawn-Omone
HediffDef.description: This pawn is being affected by pheromones, slightly enhancing several capabilities (Healing, Defense, Mov/Atk Speed).
HediffDef.descriptionShort: This pawn is being affected by pheromones, slightly enhancing several capabilities (Healing, Defense, Mov/Atk Speed).
